document.full_text: khartoum on saturday dismissed calls by the u.n. security council for it to withdraw its forces immediately from abyei, the disputed region of divided sudan they seized on may 21.
document.title: northern sudan dismisses u.n. call for troops to quit abyei
lines_and_colors: khartoum on saturday dismissed calls by the u.n. security council for it to withdraw its forces immediately from abyei, the disputed region of divided sudan they seized on may 21.
